name: Dead Mire
description:
Dead Mire is a unique atmospheric fast-paced endless wave zombie gore fest.



Ammo is scarce so you must use it tactically to dispose of as many zombies as you can with as few shots as possible. You are armed with a double barrel shotgun and you can switch between buckshot, birdshot and slugs which you must choose between wisely to maximize your damage output in any given situation.

Birdshot gives you a very wide cone but short range, ideal for taking out swarms of zombies grouping you.
Slugs have long range and will pass through objects and other zombies but travels in a narrow line, best used when you line up zombies behind one another.
Buckshot is a balance between range and width; your bread and butter for taking out zombies along with barrels and crates.



Make use of portals and bullet time to extend and break up shots, killing more zombies in a single shot. Ammo and health potions spawn from broken barrels and crates which can also be destroyed with teleported shots, traps and dynamite, maximizing your ammo conservation.

Compete against other players on the Steam leaderboard to see who can kill the most zombies before they die or run out of ammunition!
